about_the_game:
HARMA is a story-driven, high-difficulty deck-building game that integrates the player's experience of challenging a high-difficulty game with the protagonist's story of facing a harsh destiny.

Overcome Randomness

In HARMA, the outcome of all actions in combat is determined by three slots that randomly decide success or failure. However, the player can lock in successful results at crucial moments. Therefore, players must make strategic decisions to overcome randomness at decisive moments. Additionally, players can equip special relics on each slot to gain additional effects based on the slot results.

Retro Dark Fantasy Pixel Art

HARMA is crafted entirely in retro pixel art using only eight colors. Face terrifying demons rendered in the highest quality.

Grim Storyline

When fate takes everything you have, see what remains within you—something fate can never take away. In the midst of suffering, seek the meaning of life and prove that you were here.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)

short_description: HARMA is a high-difficulty roguelike deck-building game that combines a harsh story with a highly challenging gameplay experience. Demons are destroying this world. Fight against the evils of the world in an unreasonable fate. And prove that you were here.
